input_email_body:
Subject: 

Dear Customer Support, I am reporting a critical issue with the project management tool, specifically regarding the key feature of task assignment, which has stopped functioning. I suspect this might be due to a recent code update. Despite attempts to rollback the update and clear the cache, the issue continues. I have tried troubleshooting but have been unable to resolve it on my own You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. I would greatly appreciate if you could look into this matter urgently and provide a solution as soon as possible. Please let us My name is David Kim.
